frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: v414 - Production Release
node.description:
- Adhoc private chain support
- Custom Attestation Callback Url support
- Fix to display app branding in request card

node.name: v413
node.description:
- [bump build version to 413](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-mobile/commit/d425cad1cf9b5a8b2339cb650d3c7d020f4da6c7) 
- [Bug fix for 'white screen' issue (#69)](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-mobile/commit/62da54fc7266a301d32419e4567202413e70911b)
- [Fixing ts-jest config (#68)](https://github.com/uport-project/uport-mobile/commit/0c38e196944fbaceb16a815941e60cbcdeec2b4f)
